original_text: So the old man took the Levite into his house, and he fed the donkeys. When they had washed their feet, they ate a meal.
korean_text: 그를 데리고 자기 집에 들어가서 나귀에게 먹이니 그들이 발을 씻고 먹고 마시니라

sentences.original_text: So the old man took the Levite into his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 노인은 레위 사람을 자기 집으로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: When they had washed their feet
